page.title: 12HOUSING-BY IAN AND DANIEL.
page.content: There are three main types of housing in Wiston,council house,new private bungalows and old two storey houses.Most of the older buildings are in the heart of the village close to the church and the castle,most of them are stone built.The new bungalows are spread out along the roadside leading from the junction to Clarbeston Road and Llawhaden.Most of these have been built in the last twenty years and are rendered with some facing stone for decoration.Wiston stands on high ground and if taller houses were built they would as high as the sky line and they would be seen from miles around. The only housing estate is the council houses and that is very small
